featured.text: E. Eddie My childhood memory of a polar bear pacing back and forth in a very small space in a zoo keeps haunting me.

definition.zh_def: 經常出現於某地或某人的思緒中，通常帶有不安或恐懼的感覺。
definition.en_def: To visit or appear in a place frequently, often in a way that causes fear or anxiety.
definition.example: The ghost is said to haunt the old mansion at night.
